name: nft-burn?
description: nft-burn? is used to burn an asset that the SENDER principal owns. The asset must have been defined using define-non-fungible-token, and the supplied ASSET-IDENTIFIER must be of the same type specified in that definition.
On a successful burn, it returns (ok true). In the event of an unsuccessful burn it returns one of the following error codes:
(err u1) - SENDER does not own the specified asset
(err u3) - the asset specified by ASSET-IDENTIFIER does not exist
